## CONSOLE\_COMPONENT\_SINK\_SERVICE variable

Injection token for obtaining sink service for `ConsoleComponent`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CONSOLE_COMPONENT_SINK_SERVICE: InjectionToken<ConsoleComponentSink>
```
